item.description:
Hello all,

This month we're meeting at North Shore Dog (formerly Dogtopia), the doggy daycare center in Danvers on Feb 27th from 11am until 1pm.

Some general info about services offered at North Shore Dog: They offer 4 large playrooms, and the little guys have a space that is separate from the larger breeds. The space is cool in the summer...and warm in the winter. Their playroom floors are thickly rubber padded, so the dogs can run without slipping or risking any injury. They also offer "spa treatments", a self-serve dog wash area, training, and overnight stays.

 

NOTE:  This facility has changed the way they charge for its use.  It is now $40 for 2 hours. What I would like to do is ask each person (family) who signs up to pay $10 (regardless of # of dogs or people you are bringing).  If less than 4 families sign up and pay by Saturday night, I will cancel the meetup.  If more than 8 people sign up, I will reduce the fee per family.  Otherwise, I'd like to keep the difference and put it towards the fees that I pay to Meetup to keep this group running.  (It has been a while since I remember anyone paying the suggested monthly donation!)  When you RSVP, please email me for my address to send a check, or use Paypal to pay $10.

 

Thanks!  Hope to see you there!
laura & molly

group.name: Cavalier King Charles Spaniel Lovers of MA

item.name: North Shore Cavalier King Charles Spaniel February Meetup
